analysis.description:
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/33/0x654dddc32f6734a33b9cea0901c47f9a00336c1e.sol#12-13)
VisperNetwork.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/33/0x654dddc32f6734a33b9cea0901c47f9a00336c1e.sol#38-40)
